title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. In the properties file, leave the key blank but provide a valid value.

Expected result: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
Actual result: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
OB: The localization key is blank in the properties file, but it contains a valid value.
EB: The localization key cannot be left blank in the properties file.
SR: Ensure that the externalized text is set correctly in the chart title.
